version_description:
∙ Removed half game restriction on free version.
∙ Complete GUI face lift (Please see new screen shots).
∙ Removed Facebook integration as iOS now handles this functionality. Save photo to your album and use the iOS sharing feature to share with Facebook.
∙ Achievements can now be viewed locally even when logged into the Game Center.
∙ Addition of Top 6 high score table per bowling alley.
∙ Auto rotate functionality that supports both portrait orientations.
∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ League: Participate in league events with 3, 5, 7 or 9 rounds where the highest points total wins.
∙ Tournament: Test your nerves in a 4 round knockout tournament event.
∙ 28 computer opponents with customizable names. Play against the pros!
∙ Fully working lane mechanics including gutter bumpers (If needed!).
∙ Track your game progress and achievement progress locally in the new 3D Trophy Room.
∙ Increased device compatibility.
∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ Online game play added using dedicated server. Play as a guest or registered user using your iWare Designs Account.
∙ Local network game play added.
∙ Transfer player profiles and achievements between devices.
∙ Play online quickly using Guest Account sign in (No registration needed).
∙ Online instant messaging between registered friends.
∙ Ability to congratulate opponent when playing online games.
∙ Extra pin styles added.
∙ Shot timers added to online games.
∙ Increased maximum ball throw velocity.
∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ Minor bug fixes.

∙ Updated environment graphics
∙ Added back swing option to the ball throw system. You can now pull the ball backwards to perform a full swing. This is in addition to the standard flick method, either method can be used.
∙ Reduced online shot timer
∙ Bug fixes

∙ Graphical updates

∙ Compatibility with latest version of iOS
∙ Changed online play shot timer
∙ Improved online play game selection
